note.p: Birth: Northover, near Glastonbury, England (19 August 1885)
Career: Professor of Pharmacology, University College, London
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 969-984, plate, by E V Verney and J Barcroft
References: Alan W Cuthbert ' A brief history of the British Pharmacological Soviety' , BJP [British Pharmacological Sciety] Volume 147 ((S1), January 2006
